That's a great twist on the classic quote! Here's another one for you:

"I'll be back" - What did the Terminator say when he realized he left the oven on? "I'll be back... but first, I need to save my dinner!" 

Feel free to share more quotes for more laughs!

That's a clever twist on the classic quote! Here's another one for you:

"Here's looking at you, kid" - Why did the kid bring a ladder to the bar? Because they heard the bartender say, "Here's looking at you, kid... but you need to step up your game!"
